snippet.title: Cuphead - The Delicious Last Course | Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Another helping of classic Cuphead action awaits you in Cuphead - The Delicious Last Course! Brothers Cuphead and Mugman are joined by the clever, adventurous Ms. Chalice for a rollicking adventure on a previously undiscovered Inkwell Isle! With the aid of new weapons, magical charms, and Ms. Chalice’s unique abilities, players will take on a new cast of fearsome, larger than life bosses to assist the jolly Chef Saltbaker in Cuphead’s final challenging quest! For all those with an appetite for adventure, be ready to set sail for D.L.C. Isle when The Delicious Last Course launches on Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Steam, and GOG on June 30, 2022.

For all the latest information about The Delicious Last Course, be sure to visit: http://www.cupheadgame.com/dlc.html

If you haven’t had a chance to explore the Inkwell Isles yet, Cuphead is available on all platforms!

CREDITS - TRAILER

Puppetry, model work, marionette creation, stop motion animation, and filming by Screen Novelties

Director
Seamus Walsh

Producers
Chris Finnegan
Mark Caballero

Production Manager
Casey Follen

Director of Photography
Aaron Wise

Lighting Technicians
Rigel Yaluk Mosquera
Susan Shircliff

Puppeteers
Robin Walsh
Adrian Rose Leonard
Carol Binion

Stop Motion Animators
Charles D’Avignon
Alfonso Estrada
Savelen Forrest

Puppet Designer
Robin Walsh

Puppet Builders
Max Shepard
Adrian Rose Leonard
Evelyn Ross

Puppet Costumes
Carol Binion

Puppet Painter
Liz Allen

3D Sculptor
Kei Chong

Production Designer
Kelly Mazurowski

Lead Set Builder
John Joyce

Model Makers
Anuardi José Cantre Santiago
Dennis Kelly
Emily Leising

Lead Scenic Painter
Alicia Ellsworth

Scenic Painter
Krys Chang

VFX Supervisor
Andrew Babick

VFX Artist
Larry Ho

All puppetry, model, and video recording work on this trailer was conducted in accordance with strict COVID safety protocols set forth by the City of Los Angeles, California.

CREDITS - MUSIC

Music by Kristofer Maddigan
Recorded by Julian Decorte and Jeremy Darby at Canterbury Music Company in Toronto, Canada, November of 2021
Edited by Julian Decorte and Jeremy Darby
Mixed by Jeremy Darby at Canterbury Music Company in Toronto, Canada.
Mastering by Peter Letros at Wreckhouse Mastering in Toronto, Canada

Onsite Nursing Staff Provided By
C-Care Health Services Canada

The Devil’s Horns Brass Band
John Herberman – Conductor
Piccolo – Laura Chambers
Eb trumpet – Michael Fedyshyn
Cornets - Michael Fedyshyn, Michelle Wylie, Luise Heyerhoff, Brad Eaton
Flugelhorn – Brad Eaton
Tenor Horn, French Horn – Christine Passmore
Trombone – Cathy Stone, Brayden Friesen
Bass trombone - Jan Owens
Euphonium – Cathy Stone
Tuba – Jen Stephen
Percussion - Kris Maddigan

Featuring Special Guests

Piano/Celeste – Jeff McLeod
Banjo – Ben Bishop
Drums – Ted Warren
Harpsichord – Stephen Boda

This song - and all music in Cuphead - The Delicious Last Course - was recorded following all Government of Canada and Government of Ontario safety protocols, including additional measures taken to ensure performer health and safety. These measures included (but were not limited to) daily COVID rapid testing for all on-site personnel (with only those returning negative tests permitted to enter the building), strict capacity limits within all recording facilities, enforced separation between all performing musicians using physical barriers, rigid mask mandates with exceptions only for vocal performers doing their work, and full UV light treatment and sanitization of the recording facilities between sessions. Our immense thanks to Jeremy Darby for figuring out how to record safely and securely with this many performers. No performers or staff working on the Cuphead - The Delicious Last Course soundtrack contracted COVID as a part of their work.

CREDITS - SFX
Sound effects work was done by Csaba Wagner of Sweet Justice
